name: Pudge
title: Butcher
lore: The Butcher haunts the shadows, his terrible meat hook searching for victims to drag to their doom.

meatHook.name: Meat Hook
meatHook.description: Launches a hook that drags the first unit it hits back to Pudge, dealing damage.

rot.name: Rot
rot.description: Deals damage per second to nearby enemies and slows them, but also damages Pudge.

fleshHeap.name: Flesh Heap
fleshHeap.description: Grants magic resistance and strength for each nearby hero death.

dismember.name: Dismember
dismember.description: Pudge chews on an enemy for several seconds, dealing massive damage and healing himself.
